channel.title: Invo look
channel.description: hey, i added some customs to my server (317 delta) and when u wield em they look fine but in invo and on ground they are nothing what they should be. i changed the model# in the ints to the correct 1 and then they just turn invisable. how do i fix this?

item.title: Invo look
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

if you did it all 100% right then the only thing left is that the model itself is bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Invo look
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

ok its arma godbow heres the int

}
if(i == 8007) {
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want
class8.anInt174 = 13557; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 13556; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 13556; // Female Wield
class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller
class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards
class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up
class8.aString170 = “Armadyl Godbow”; // Item Name
class8.aByteArray178 = “The all mighty Armadyl Godbow”.getBytes(); // Item Examine
